descriptionHtml:
[url=https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7359/16383335445_4efd728c13_o.png][img]https://farm8.staticflickr.com/7359/16383335445_a1def89c2f_c.jpg[/img]
[/url]


This mod adds a Mage follower, Imo. She is essential, and her body type is UNP.
[color=#ff0000][b]
[size=5][b][size=5]This mod requires DLC1 DawnGuard 
and the HDT Physics Extensions, which can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]here[/url][/size][/b][/size]
[/b][/color][color=#00ffff][size=4]
[Known Bugs][/size][/color]
Imo can become invisible.
Hairstyle can stretch.
*Both can be fixed by removing her helmet.
[b]Recommended [url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/hangakin/archives/36783080.html]HDT Alpha Fix[/url].[/b]

[color=#00ffff][size=4][Location][/size][/color]
Imo can be found at the Hall of the Dead in Whiterun.
If she is not there, please check to see if you installed the mod correctly.


[color=#ffff00][size=4][Imo's Performance][/size][/color][color=#ffff00]
[/color]Imo uses Destruction, Restoration, and Conjuration as her main skills.
She's also okay at Light Armor, Sneak, and Alteration.
She is a healer and also uses special Destruction magic and summons.
She has high magicka, but low health, so help her out!
[color=#ffff00][size=4]
[Imo's Spells]
[/size][/color]
Initial equipping
 
[color=#ff00ff][Force1H][/color] Right Hand-Destruction Magic 
Cost-100 Magicka
20 Damage+Burn damage
White flame damages the health and stamina of the target 
while burning it. 
Slow travel speed, semi-long charge time, staggers chance 20% target. 

[color=#ff00ff][Force2H] [/color]Both Hand Magic-Destruction
Cost-400 Magicka
50 damage+Burn Damage in 15ft.
White flame damages the health and stamina of the target 
while burning it.
Slow travel speed,  long charge time, staggers Chance 33% in 5ft.

[color=#ff00ff][Force Explosion] [/color]Both Hand Magic-Destruction 
Cost-2000 Magicka
66 damage+Burn damage
White flame damages the health and stamina of the target 
while burning it.
Use when the target is in close range.
Master Spell charging.
30 extra damage+burn damage to the enemies within 20ft.
Staggers Chance 66% enemies within 15ft, blows away chance 50% the enemies within 8ft.

[color=#ff00ff][Ward][/color] Left Hand Magic-Restoration 
Cost-30 Magicka per second 
Armor/Magic defense-60
Stable cost, and decently strong shield magic.
[color=#ff00ff]
[Healing] [/color]Shout 
Charge Time-30s
Restores nearby allys' health by 100 points. 
It's a shout so it can be used when the hands are occupied.
[color=#ff00ff]
[SummonDwarvenEyebot] [/color]Conjuration Magic 
Cost-100 Magicka
Duration-60s
Summons 4 Type Dwarven robots Random.
Level is half the user's.Max Leveled 30.I will often use melee in a blitz.
Every four attacks, it uses restoration magic to heal allys within 15ft by 50 points.
Remember, it levels up with the user.
[img]http://www.fastpic.jp/images.php?file=6835644791.jpg[/img]


[color=#1e84cc][size=6][b][[url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/hangakin/]My blog[/url]][/b][/size]
[/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=4][Change Log]
[/size][/color]1.21>2.0 
Adjusted Vertex Edit.
Fixed Face texture.
Changed Magic Effect.
Changed All Magic Performance.
Added Glasses.

1.2>1.21
Fixed Japanese Language to English.

1.0>1.2
Fixed path of hair Mesh.
Fixed fire effect of Force.
Change the size of the graphic in one hand and both hands of Force.


[color=#00ffff][size=4][Required Mods][/size][/color]
Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT
A Follower Overhaul mod

[color=#00ffff][size=4][Recommended Mods][/size][/color]
Face Light by tktk1
Female Facial Animation by nao4288
[b][url=http://blog.livedoor.jp/hangakin/archives/36783080.html]HDT Alpha Fix[/url] by towawot[/b]

[color=#00ffff][size=4][Credit][/size][/color]
Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team
DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaleyy
Asian Doll Face by Luminas
XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32
High Definition Undergarments - UNP UNPB by crispiniscool
High Poly Hands and Feet for UNP bodies by Halofarm v1.0
[url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html]Vicn Creature Resources[/url] by Vicn
Gim Boots by Gimora
OmakeRobe by Jibunn

[b][color=#00ffff][Special Thanks][/color]
[color=#00ff00]Special Hairstyles of HHairstyles by HHaleyy
Special Flower Eyes of Mikan Eyes By nerune[/color]
[size=4]Thank you, thank you Again.[/size]
